ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Signed"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled") ), OR( ISBLANK(Amount), ISBLANK(Fronter__c), ISBLANK(Closer__c), ISBLANK(First_Draft_Date__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the Stage is set to 'Contract Signed', the Amount, First draft date, Frontor, and Closer fields must be filled.
